page.title: 11Playing in the woods
page.content: Sometimes Rebecca and Samantha come to stay with their grandma and grandad. We have quite a{quiet wood and we have a{nun's house}at the back. Last month we made a camp out of wood, fern, gates, wheels and seats then we camouflaged it. We go in it quite a lot. The people who lived in our house before had a swing and we have it now. Alice Murphy, who lives next door, has the wood as well. But James and Andrew have a smaller garden so they have no wood but we play in the wood a lot. I like playing in the woods. Our garden is 300 feet long to the woods. We go and see the nun's and take them flowers in the summer. It is an {old peoples home}as well and we take {flowers}to them in the{summer. They have their{own church.
